text: class [EnsembleRetriever (BaseRetriever): “""Retriever that ensembles the multiple retrievers. It uses a rank fusion. Args: retrievers: A list of retrievers to ensemble. weights: A list of weights corresponding 60 the retrievers. Defaults 60 equal weighting for all retrievers. 다 A constant added 60 the rank, controlling the balance between the importance 메 high-ranked items and the consideration given to lower-ranked items. Default is 60. id key: The key in the document’s metadata used to determine unique documents. 페 not specified, page_content is used.
